meanings.definition: A person or thing that extrudes.
meanings.sent1: The extruders at the factory work tirelessly to create long plastic tubes.
meanings.sent2: The extruders in the play were skilled at shaping clay into beautiful sculptures.
meanings.sent3: The extruders in the game were like magical wizards, shaping reality with their powers.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like extruders, molding the minds of those who listened.
meanings.sent5: The extruders in the story were like artists, shaping the world with their creativity.

meanings.definition: A machine used for extruding materials.
meanings.sent1: The extruders in the workshop were used to create long metal rods.
meanings.sent2: The extruders in the factory were essential for shaping plastic into various forms.
meanings.sent3: The extruders in the kitchen seemed to have a mind of their own, spitting out pasta endlessly.
meanings.sent4: The extruders hummed like a content bee, working tirelessly to produce perfect shapes.
meanings.sent5: The extruders in the lab were like sculptors, molding materials into precise shapes.
